Kuukua Eshun bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ghana-America, onye na-ese ihe na odee
Kuukua na-eme ka a mara banyere nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ahụike uche site na edemede na ihe nkiri ya. Ọ bụ onye guzobere Boxedkids.

Ihe nkiri mbụ Kuukua nke akpọrọ Artist, Act of Love meriri ihe nrite na mmemme ihe nkiri ụmụ nwanyị zuru ụwa ọnụ maka mmetụta kachasị mma. Ọ bụ onye guzobere Skate Gal Club. Kuukua kwenyere na ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị nke mere ka ọ mee ngagharị iwe nke ukwuu n'okporo ámá Accra
Ọ rụkọtara ọrụ na UNFPA Ghana iji mee nnọkọ ọgwụgwọ maka ụmụ agbọghọ ndị lanarịrị mwakpo mmekọahụ.
Kuukua na onye egwu Naijiria bụ Wizkid rụkọtara ọrụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya ebe ọ duziri ya ihe ngosi.
Ihe nkiri ya na nso nso a nke a kpọrọ "Unveiling" gosiri nna Museum Ostwall Im Dortmunder U na Germany na ngosipụta ya na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ruo na Machị 2022
Ọ bụ ANO Institute of Arts & Knowledge nyere iwu ka ihe nkiri ahụ mee ihe ma Kuukua mepụtara ma duzie ya.
Kuukua duziri ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke onye egwu Naijiria bụ Wizkid maka abọm ya bụ Made In Lagos nke akpọrọ Made In Lagos Deluxe Film nke e wepụtara na Disemba 2021
Ya na Wizkid duziri ihe nkiri a dị mkpirikpi.
